body.text:
Name : Pablo Ordonez Email : pablo.ordonez@prosintesis.comCompany : Prosintesis SA CV (Mexico)Telephone : 525540947254 Country : Mexico Message : Dear Sirs:
Good morning.
Please provide us with your best quotation for the following:
– PEG 500 (CAS: 25322-68-3)
– PEG 4000 (CAS: 25322-68-3)
– Propylene glycol (CAS: 57-55-6)
Please provide us your best FOB quotation per ton.
Also, please inform your availability and please comment if you are manufacturers of these products.
Thank you in advance and we remain awaiting for your valuable comments.With best regards,
Pablo Ordonez / Prosintesis (Mexico)
